\documentclass[letterpaper,11pt]{article}

\usepackage{latexsym}
\usepackage[empty]{fullpage}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{marvosym}
\usepackage[usenames,dvipsnames]{color}
\usepackage{verbatim}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage[hidelinks]{hyperref}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{fontawesome5}
\usepackage{mathptmx}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[margin=0.5in]{geometry}
\input{glyphtounicode}

\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyfoot{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}

\urlstyle{same}
\raggedbottom
\raggedright
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{0in}

\titleformat{\section}{
  \vspace{-6pt}\scshape\raggedright\large
}{}{0em}{}[\color{black}\titlerule \vspace{-5pt}]

\pdfgentounicode=1

%============================================================================
% CUSTOM COMMANDS - Formatting structure (do not edit)
%============================================================================

\newcommand{\ifnotempty}[2]{\ifx&#1&\else#2\fi}

\newcommand{\contactItem}[3]{%
  \ifnotempty{#3}{#1~\href{#2}{\underline{#3}} \hspace{8pt}}%
}

\newcommand{\contactItemNoLink}[2]{%
  \ifnotempty{#2}{#1~#2 \hspace{8pt}}%
}

\newcommand{\resumeItem}[1]{
  \item\small{
    {#1 \vspace{-2pt}}
  }
}

\newcommand{\resumeSubheading}[4]{
  \vspace{-2pt}\item
    \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
      \textbf{#1} & \small#2 \\
      \textit{\small#3} & \textit{\small #4} \\
    \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}
}

\newcommand{\resumeSubSubheading}[2]{
    \item
    \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
      \textit{\small#1} & \textit{\small #2} \\
    \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}
}

\newcommand{\resumeProjectHeading}[2]{
    \item
    \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
      \small#1 & \small#2 \\
    \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}
}

\newcommand{\resumeSubItem}[1]{\resumeItem{#1}\vspace{-4pt}}

\newcommand{\resumeCertItem}[2]{
  \item
    \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}[t]{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
      \textbf{#1} & \small#2 \\
    \end{tabular*}\vspace{-6pt}
}

\renewcommand\labelitemii{$\vcenter{\hbox{\tiny$\bullet$}}$}

\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListStart}{\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=0.15in, label={}]}
\newcommand{\resumeSubHeadingListEnd}{\end{itemize}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListStart}{\begin{itemize}}
\newcommand{\resumeItemListEnd}{\end{itemize}\vspace{-5pt}}

%============================================================================
% DOCUMENT START
%============================================================================

\begin{document}

\input{data-contact.tex}

\begin{center}
    \textbf{\Huge \scshape \MyName} \\ \vspace{4pt}
    \small 
    \contactItemNoLink{\faIcon{phone}}{\MyPhone}
    \contactItem{\faIcon{envelope}}{mailto:\MyEmail}{\MyEmail}
    \contactItem{\faIcon{linkedin}}{https://\MyLinkedIn}{\MyLinkedIn}
    \contactItem{\faIcon{github}}{https://\MyGitHub}{\MyGitHub}
    \contactItem{\faIcon{globe}}{https://\MyPortfolio}{\MyPortfolio}
\end{center}

\input{data-resume.tex}

\resumeContent

\end{document}
